translations: and in it We will return you
and from it We will bring you out
puzzle.hint: This verse speaks about the origin, destiny, and resurrection of humanity in relation to the earth.
puzzle.arabic: ۞ مِنْهَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمْ وَمِنْهَا نُخْرِجُكُمْ تَارَةً أُخْرَىٰ
puzzle.verseEn: From it [i.e., the earth] We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.
